data.name: janet
data.value: I'm personally pro Crocs. I think I didn't like Crocs at first like I wasn't interested, but my boyfriend wanted us to get matching Crocs, and I was like what am I doing here of course of course I'll get matching Crocs with my boyfriend yeah why why not and then when I got them I'm like you know honestly it's very fun. Don’t knock it until you try it.

data.name: ben
data.value: The secret advantage of Crocs too is they're kind of like Sleds on your feet. Like if there was a downhill slope...

data.name: leo
data.value: ...that would prove my love of Crocs if I got my slide on.
